description: Mini LaptopThe Airbender Mini 1.0 is the most versatile case yet for your iPad Mini 1st and 2nd gen. Offering a true laptop like experience with its unique multi-versatile hinge. Just open and use it like a laptop or fold and rotate the iPad Mini  over the keyboard and voila ~ tablet mode.Elegantly BeautifulWith a smooth, matte  black exterior and glossy black piano  interior - the Mini 1.0 is the perfect match to the iPad Mini. Your iPad Mini will feel just at home, so go on take it out and show it off.Ultra SlimKeeping with the iPad Mini slim design the Mini 1.0 does not dissapoint. At 1.8 cm thick the Mini 1.0 is the slimmest full protection keyboard case. Let not forget that ingeniously packed into the case is a full QWERTY keyboard.So its true good thing come in small packages.Keyboard Specifications.Input: 5V@1ABluetooth connection: Range of 33ft or 10mDimensions: 7.9 x 6 x 0.7 inchesBe sure to find the official New Trent logo to ensure a 10 month warranty.
title: New Trent Airbender Mini 1.0 - Clamshell Wireless Bluetooth iPad Mini Keyboard case. Compatible: 1st & 2nd Gen iPad Mini (polycarbonate, matte case)
